#summary Screenshots that show what's possible with HeeksCAD
=The HeeksCAD Interface=

Dan Falck has been using [http://code.google.com/p/heekspython/ HeeksPython] to [http://opensourcedesigntools.blogspot.com/2010/11/creating-cross-sections-of-parts-in.html automatically import dxf files and convert them to solids].
http://heekscad.googlecode.com/files/cross_section.png

Using just the HeeksCAD interface, it's possible to get reasonable results.
